snippet.title: SYNCED: Off-Planet official CG Trailer at Gamescom 2019
snippet.description:
This is SYNCED: Off-Planet, a PVPVE Third-Person shooter game announced at #Gamescom2019, initiated by #NExTStudios.

SYNCED: Off-Planet provides innovative PVE Survival & PVP mixed experience. Up to 50 survivors must face each other and with thousands of Nanos to embark the Ark-Shuttle and escape the planet. Players will craft their progression, build their Haven, overcome the onslaught of Nanos and eventually… escape Earth.

You can follow us on all social platforms under @syncedoffplanet, and join us in writing the story of mankind together.

Discord: https://discord.gg/45eRhSf
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/syncedoffplanet/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SyncedOffPlanet
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/syncedoffplanet/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/syncedoffplanet/
Website: https://www.nextstudios.com/sop
